extension.name: Facebook Feed
extension.author: e-motion design
extension.description: A simple module to show a Facebook Page feed

field.name: fb_profile_id
field.label: Facebook Profile
field.description: Provide the numeric ID or the username of the Facebook Page that you want to load the feed from.

field.name: fb_app_id
field.label: Facebook App ID
field.description: Provide the App ID of a Facebook app. Use a Page welcome tab app or similar

field.name: fb_app_secret
field.label: Facebook App Secret
field.description: Provide the App Secret of a Facebook app. Use a Page welcome tab app or similar

field.name: feed_limit
field.label: Feed Limit
field.description: How many posts do you want to show from the feed?
